meanings.definition: An object kept as a reminder or souvenir of a person or event.
meanings.sent1: She treasured the mementos from her childhood.
meanings.sent2: The photo album was filled with mementos of their travels.
meanings.sent3: The mementos on her desk always made her smile.
meanings.sent4: Each memento held a piece of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The mementos sparkled with memories of days gone by.

meanings.definition: A keepsake or token of remembrance.
meanings.sent1: He gave her a beautiful memento to remember their anniversary.
meanings.sent2: The locket was a precious memento of her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The memento brought back bittersweet memories.
meanings.sent4: Her memento was a symbol of their everlasting love.
meanings.sent5: The memento whispered stories of the past.
